00004 class Mark(object):
00005 
00006     def __init__(self, name, index, line, column, buffer, pointer):
00007         self.name = name
00008         self.index = index
00009         self.line = line
00010         self.column = column
00011         self.buffer = buffer
00012         self.pointer = pointer
00013 
00014     def get_snippet(self, indent=4, max_length=75):
00015         if self.buffer is None:
00016             return None
00017         head = ''
00018         start = self.pointer
00019         while start > 0 and self.buffer[start-1] not in u'\0\r\n\x85\u2028\u2029':
00020             start -= 1
00021             if self.pointer-start > max_length/2-1:
00022                 head = ' ... '
00023                 start += 5
00024                 break
00025         tail = ''
00026         end = self.pointer
00027         while end < len(self.buffer) and self.buffer[end] not in u'\0\r\n\x85\u2028\u2029':
00028             end += 1
00029             if end-self.pointer > max_length/2-1:
00030                 tail = ' ... '
00031                 end -= 5
00032                 break
00033         snippet = self.buffer[start:end].encode('utf-8')
00034         return ' '*indent + head + snippet + tail + '\n'  \
00035                 + ' '*(indent+self.pointer-start+len(head)) + '^'
00036 
00037     def __str__(self):
00038         snippet = self.get_snippet()
00039         where = "  in \"%s\", line %d, column %d"   \
00040                 % (self.name, self.line+1, self.column+1)
00041         if snippet is not None:
00042             where += ":\n"+snippet
00043         return where
00044 
00045 class YAMLError(Exception):
00046     pass
00047 
00048 class MarkedYAMLError(YAMLError):
00049 
00050     def __init__(self, context=None, context_mark=None,
00051             problem=None, problem_mark=None, note=None):
00052         self.context = context
00053         self.context_mark = context_mark
00054         self.problem = problem
00055         self.problem_mark = problem_mark
00056         self.note = note
00057 
00058     def __str__(self):
00059         lines = []
00060         if self.context is not None:
00061             lines.append(self.context)
00062         if self.context_mark is not None  \
00063             and (self.problem is None or self.problem_mark is None
00064                     or self.context_mark.name != self.problem_mark.name
00065                     or self.context_mark.line != self.problem_mark.line
00066                     or self.context_mark.column != self.problem_mark.column):
00067             lines.append(str(self.context_mark))
00068         if self.problem is not None:
00069             lines.append(self.problem)
00070         if self.problem_mark is not None:
00071             lines.append(str(self.problem_mark))
00072         if self.note is not None:
00073             lines.append(self.note)
00074         return '\n'.join(lines)
